data.oai_dc:dc: This checklist was developed at a stakeholders meeting held at the Centre For Plant Medicine Research (CPMR), Mampong-Akwapem on 13th December 2017. The meeting was chaired by Prof. Augustine Ocloo, Executive Director, CPMR, and was attended 22 people including GHATFRAM members. In total, 97 species of medicinal plants were listed as threatened|97 occurrences
